getWebMethodsHome

public static java.lang.String getWebMethodsHome()
Get path to installation location of Software AG Suite. If this is called from within a running IS instance, it will query the System properties, which hold this values. If called otherwise, it requires the environment variable to be set; otherwise a RuntimeException will be thrown.

Returns:
path to

getIntegrationServerHome

public static java.lang.String getIntegrationServerHome()
Get path to installation location if Integration Server. If this is called from within a running IS instance, it will query the System properties, which hold this values. Otherwise the environment variable will be used to determine the installation directory; in there a check is performed if a directory for the default instance (on v9.5 or higher) exists or not. If the default instance exists it will returned; otherwise the main Integration Server directory will be returned. This fall-back logic is used to run unit tests outside the server.

Returns:
path to Integration Server installation
